languages.text:
During ground or space combat, you can use [LMB] + [ALT] to highlight a selected object to emphasise it for other group members will focus on it. You can highlight:
-<indent=5%>a creature model</indent>
-<indent=5%>an icon on the abilities panel</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield</indent>
languages.original_text:
Использовав Alt + LMB на:
врага вы подсветите врага (на враге появится желтый круг)
на абилку в панеле игрока вы подсветите выбранную абилку (появится желтое выделение)
на клетку локации вы подсветите выбранную клетку

-<indent=5%>...a cell on the battlefield</indent>

languages.text:
Durante el combate en tierra o en el espacio, puedes usar [clic izquierdo] + [ALT] para resaltar un objeto para indicárselo al resto del grupo. Puedes resaltar:
-<indent=5%>una criatura</indent>
-<indent=5%>un icono del panel de capacidades</indent>
-<indent=5%>una casilla del campo de batalla</indent>
languages.original_text:
During ground or space combat, you can use [LMB] + [ALT] to highlight a selected object to emphasise it for other group members will focus on it. You can highlight:
-<indent=5%>a creature model</indent>
-<indent=5%>an icon on the abilities panel</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Durante el combate en tierra o en el espacio, puedes usar [clic izquierdo] + [ALT] para resaltar un objeto para indicárselo al resto del grupo. Puedes resaltar:

-<indent=5%>un icono del panel de capacidades</indent>
-<indent=5%>una casilla del campo de batalla</indent>

languages.text:
地上戦または宇宙戦の最中に [LMB] + [ALT] を使用することで、他のグループメンバーに注目させるために、選択したオブジェクトをハイライト表示することができる。ハイライト対象：
-<indent=5%>クリーチャーの模型1つ</indent>
-<indent=5%>アビリティパネルのアイコン1つ</indent>
-<indent=5%>バトルフィールドのセル1つ</indent>
languages.original_text:
During ground or space combat, you can use [LMB] + [ALT] to highlight a selected object to emphasise it for other group members will focus on it. You can highlight:
-<indent=5%>a creature model</indent>
-<indent=5%>an icon on the abilities panel</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield</indent>

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
在地面战斗或太空战斗期间，您可以按下ALT+鼠标左键高亮标记选定的目标，引起其他玩家注意。您可以标记的内容包括：
- <indent=5%>目标生物</indent>
- <indent=5%>能力面板上的图标</indent>
- <indent=5%>战场上的格子</indent>
languages.original_text:
During ground or space combat, you can use [LMB] + [ALT] to highlight a selected object to emphasise it for other group members will focus on it. You can highlight:
-<indent=5%>a creature model</indent>
-<indent=5%>an icon on the abilities panel</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield</indent>

traits.locale_text:
在地面战斗或太空战斗期间，您可以按下ALT+鼠标左键高亮标记选定的目标，引起其他玩家注意。您可以标记的内容包括：
- <indent=5%>目标生物</indent>
- <indent=5%>能力面板上的图标</indent>
- <indent=5%>战场上的格子</indent>

languages.text:
Während eines Boden- oder Raumkampfs kannst du mit [LMB] + [ALT] ein gewähltes Objekt markieren, um andere Gruppenmitglieder darauf hinzuweisen. Folgendes kannst du markieren:
-<indent=5%>ein Kreaturenmodell</indent>
-<indent=5%>ein Symbol auf dem Fähigkeitsfeld</indent>
-<indent=5%>eine Zelle auf dem Schlachtfeld</indent>
languages.original_text:
During ground or space combat, you can use [LMB] + [ALT] to highlight a selected object to emphasise it for other group members will focus on it. You can highlight:
-<indent=5%>a creature model</indent>
-<indent=5%>an icon on the abilities panel</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield</indent>

languages.text:
Lors des combats au sol ou dans l'espace, utilisez [BGS] + [ALT] pour mettre en évidence un élément qui vous paraît important. Vous pouvez le faire sur :
-<indent=5%>un modèle de créature</indent>
-<indent=5%>une icône du panneau des capacités</indent>
-<indent=5%>une case du champ de bataille</indent>
languages.original_text:
During ground or space combat, you can use [LMB] + [ALT] to highlight a selected object to emphasise it for other group members will focus on it. You can highlight:
-<indent=5%>a creature model</indent>
-<indent=5%>an icon on the abilities panel</indent>
-<indent=5%>a cell on the battlefield</indent>

traits.locale_text:

-<indent=5%>une case du champ de bataille</indent>

languages.text:
В наземном и космическом бою с помощью сочетания [ЛКМ] + [ALT] можно подсветить выбранный объект для других членов группы. Вы можете выделить:
-<indent=5%>существо</indent>
-<indent=5%>иконку на панели способностей</indent>
-<indent=5%>клетку на поле боя</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>клетку на поле боя</indent>

languages.text:
Kara veya uzay çatışmalarında seçili bir nesneyi sol fare tuşu + [ALT] ile aydınlatarak vurgulayabilirsin. Böylece diğer grup üyeleri de ona odaklanabilir. Vurgulayabileceklerin şunlardır:
-<indent=5%>Bir yaratık modeli</indent>
-<indent=5%>Kabiliyet panelindeki bir simge</indent>
-<indent=5%>Çatışma alanındaki bir hücre</indent>
